## Access Details

### Requested Access Level

<!-- Mark the level you're requesting with an 'x' -->

- [ ] **Read** - View code, clone repository, create issues
- [ ] **Write** - Read permissions + push code, create branches, manage issues and PRs  
- [ ] **Maintain** - Write permissions + manage settings (without destructive actions)
- [ ] **Admin** - Full permissions including repository settings and team management
